Name: Kaolinite Al_2Si_2O_5(OH)_4
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Phyllosilicates
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: PS-1A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Georgia, Washington County
Collected by Clay Mineral Society
Description:  Well-ordered Kaolinite. 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ps01aa.txt
